name: Asphalt 4: Elite Racing HD
summary: Face the world's richest drivers in high-speed races through traffic. Choose among 10 dream cars and bikes from the world's most prestigious manufacturers, such as Ferrari and Bugatti, and zoom through the streets of Monte Carlo, New York, Shanghai, Paris, Dubai, and Beverly Hills to impose your style. Check your rides in your own garage and spend millions to tune them. The police await you in each city with roadblocks and helicopters to try and confiscate your expensive toy, so you'll need to drive to the limit to avoid them. Can you become the ultimate VIP of urban racing?
